issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: shutdown method in DataNode.java could generate thousand of log entries with the same message in a very short time

comments.body:
I know this was still happening in hadoop 1.x and suspect it is still happening in 2.x.

When I've seen this particular bug, the DN has run out of memory and the JVM is desparately trying to shut itself down because the world has collapsed around it.
